document.full_text: having established his directing bona fides with screen adaptations of the musicals "chicago" and "nine," rob marshall steps into the action arena for the first time with disney's big-budget summer sequel "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides." he spoke to thr about the film prior to its cannes premiere on saturday.
document.title: cannes q&a: "pirates" director rob marshall
lines_and_colors: having established his directing bona fides with screen adaptations of the musicals "chicago" and "nine," rob marshall steps into the action arena for the first time with disney's big-budget summer sequel "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides." he spoke to thr about the film prior to its cannes premiere on saturday.
